get.description: This endpoint allows you to **query all the coin data of a coin (name, price, market .... including exchange tickers) on CoinGecko coin page based on a particular coin id**.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description:
coin id
*refers to [`/coins/list`](/reference/coins-list).

parameters.name: localization
parameters.description: include all the localized languages in the response, default: true

parameters.name: tickers
parameters.description: include tickers data, default: true

parameters.name: market_data
parameters.description: include market data, default: true

parameters.name: community_data
parameters.description: include community data, default: true

parameters.name: developer_data
parameters.description: include developer data, default: true

parameters.name: sparkline
parameters.description: include sparkline 7 days data, default: false

200.description: Get current data for a coin

get.description: This endpoint allows you to **query the historical data (price, market cap, 24hrs volume, etc) at a given date for a coin based on a particular coin id**.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description:
coin id
*refers to [`/coins/list`](/reference/coins-list).

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
the date of data snapshot
Format: `dd-mm-yyyy`

parameters.name: localization
parameters.description: include all the localized languages in response, default: true

200.description: Get historical data (name, price, market, stats) at a given date for a coin

get.summary: Coin Historical Chart Data by ID
get.description: This endpoint allows you to **get the historical chart data of a coin including time in UNIX, price, market cap and 24hrs volume based on particular coin id**.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description:
coin id
*refers to [`/coins/list`](/reference/coins-list).

parameters.name: vs_currency
parameters.description:
target currency of market data
*refers to [`/simple/supported_vs_currencies`](/reference/simple-supported-currencies).

parameters.name: days
parameters.description:
data up to number of days ago
you may use any integer for number of days

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: data interval, leave empty for auto granularity Possible value: daily

parameters.name: precision
parameters.description: decimal place for currency price value

200.description: Get historical market data include price, market cap, and 24h volume (granularity auto)

get.description: This endpoint allows you to **get the OHLC chart (Open, High, Low, Close) of a coin based on particular coin id**.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description:
coin id
*refers to [`/coins/list`](/reference/coins-list).

parameters.name: vs_currency
parameters.description:
target currency of price data
*refers to [`/simple/supported_vs_currencies`](/reference/simple-supported-currencies).

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: data up to number of days ago

parameters.name: precision
parameters.description: decimal place for currency price value

get.description: This endpoint allows you to **query the coin tickers on both centralized exchange (cex) and decentralized exchange (dex) based on a particular coin id**.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description:
coin id
*refers to [`/coins/list`](/reference/coins-list).

parameters.name: exchange_ids
parameters.description:
exchange id
*refers to [`/exchanges/list`](/reference/exchanges-list).

parameters.name: include_exchange_logo
parameters.description: include exchange logo, default: false

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: page through results

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: use this to sort the order of responses, default: trust_score_desc

parameters.name: depth
parameters.description:
include 2% orderbook depth, ie. `cost_to_move_up_usd` and `cost_to_move_down_usd`
default: false

platforms.description: coin asset platform and contract address

detail_platforms.description: detailed coin asset platform and contract address

mcap_to_tvl_ratio.description: market cap to total value locked ratio

fdv_to_tvl_ratio.description: fully diluted valuation to total value locked ratio

ath.description: coin all time high (ath) in currency

ath_change_percentage.description: coin all time high (ath) change in percentage

atl.description: coin all time low (atl) in currency

atl_change_percentage.description: coin all time low (atl) change in percentage

fully_diluted_valuation.description: coin fully diluted valuation (fdv) in currency

market_cap_fdv_ratio.description: market cap to fully diluted valuation ratio

total_volume.description: coin total trading volume in currency

market_cap_change_24h.description: coin 24h market cap change in currency

market_cap_change_percentage_24h.description: coin 24h market cap change in percentage

market_cap_change_24h_in_currency.description: coin 24h market cap change in currency

market_cap_change_percentage_24h_in_curr.description: coin 24h market cap change in percentage

last_updated.description: coin market data last updated timestamp

reddit_average_posts_48h.description: coin reddit average posts in 48 hours

reddit_average_comments_48h.description: coin reddit average comments in 48 hours

reddit_accounts_active_48h.description: coin reddit active accounts in 48 hours

code_additions_deletions_4_weeks.description: coin code additions and deletions in 4 weeks

commit_count_4_weeks.description: coin repository commit count in 4 weeks

last_4_weeks_commit_activity_series.description: coin repository last 4 weeks commit activity series

bid_ask_spread_percentage.description: coin ticker bid ask spread percentage

coin_id.description: coin ticker base currency coin id

target_coin_id.description: coin ticker target currency coin id

cost_to_move_up_usd.description: coin ticker cost to move up in usd

cost_to_move_down_usd.description: coin ticker cost to move down in usd

bid_ask_spread_percentage.description: coin ticker bid ask spread percentage

coin_id.description: coin ticker base currency coin id

target_coin_id.description: coin ticker target currency coin id
